title: The Masked Singer's Spider is revealed and one of the judges guessed right
text:
The first of two Masked Singer Australia contestants was revealed on Tuesday night.

Hiding inside the spider costume was singer Paulini - and it turns out one of the judges guessed right, while another came close.

Earlier in the episode, Jackie 'O' Henderson thought she'd cracked the case - and she had.

Web of truth: The Masked Singer's Spider was revealed on Tuesday night

'I'm going to go back to Paulini because she's from the Young Divas,' she said, having already guessed her in an earlier episode.

Referring to the clues, she added: 'I know that there's been a couple of issues in the past with Paulini. But I don't know. I toss up between Paulini and Jess Mauboy.'

Once it was time to lock in a choice, Jackie stuck to her guns, guessing that one clue - the letters PC - stood for Paulini's surname, Curuenavuli.

Knew it! Hiding inside the spider costume was singer Paulini, and it turns out one of the judges guessed right, while another came close

Picked her! Earlier in the episode, Jackie 'O' Henderson thought she'd cracked the case - and she had. 'Last week when you shortened 'politically correct' to PC, I thought, well, that's Paulini's initials, so I'm gonna lock in Paulini,' she insisted

'I've always been tossing up between Jess Mauboy or Paulini, but last week when you shortened 'politically correct' to PC, I thought, well, that's Paulini's initials, so I'm gonna lock in Paulini,' she insisted.

When it was revealed, the singer explained what her clues meant.

'My dad was a former choirmaster in church,' she said, adding that the religious references were to do with her upbringing.

Good work! Jackie 'O' Henderson (left) guessed right. And Lindsay Lohan (right) insisted that she was not far off

'I grew up in church and that's pretty much where I learnt how to sing,' she told the judges.

She also revealed one of the clues was to do with her time in the girl group The Young Divas.

Judge Lindsay Lohan insisted that she had considered that clue and came close to guessing Paulini right.

Lindsay cried out: 'I wrote that down! I wrote The Young Divas down. It's in my notebook!'
description: The first of two Masked Singer Australia contestants was revealed on Tuesday night.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
